room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Milwaukee in Milwaukee
review: We had a great time solving the mystery of the Museum Heist! The Breakout was a fantastic experience. Our adviser (Katy) was very helpful with providing us clues when we were stumped with where to go next. Great time had by all!

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Milwaukee in Milwaukee
review: We played Museum Heist with family for my husband's birthday.  It was our first experience, lots of fun, a good time for all and our game host Kyrstyna was great, helpful and did not solve the puzzles for us.  We will definitely do another game room!

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Milwaukee in Milwaukee
review: We did the heist at the art museum. Very challenging. Got through it with a few hints! Lots of fun.

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Milwaukee in Milwaukee
review: Did the Museum heist with two friends. Lots of fun. One of the best escape rooms we have done. Have done 4 others. Would recommend. Would love to do the kidnap game.

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Milwaukee in Milwaukee
review: There was 8 of us in the Museum room. We had a great master. We unfortunately ran out of time, but still had a blast. Have to go back with the entire family.
